problem_text_cn: 如图,定点C、动点D在⊙O上,并且位于直径AB的两侧,AB=5,AC=3,过点C在作CE⊥CD交DB的延长线于点E,则线段CE长度的最大值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the fixed point C and the moving point D are on ⊙O, and are located on both edges of the diameter AB, AB = N_0, AC = N_1, and the crossing point C is used as CE ⊥ CD intersects the extended line line of DB at point E, then the line segment CE The maximum length is ()
raw_answer: 解:当CD是直径时,CE最长,∵AB是直径,∴∠ACB=90°,∴BC=√{AB²-AC²}=√{5²-3²}=4,∵∠A=∠D,∠ABC=∠ACE=90°,∴△ABC∽△DCE,∴\frac{AC}{CD}=\frac{BC}{CE},即\frac{3}{5}=\frac{4}{CE},∴CE=\frac{20}{3},故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的判定和性质,圆周角定理,解直角三角形,勾股定理的应用,确定CE什么时候取最大值是解题的关键．
